Package components.players

Class MediumAIPlayer

java.lang.Object
components.players.Player
components.players.AIPlayer
components.players.MediumAIPlayer
public class MediumAIPlayer extends AIPlayer
This AI Player class represents a medium-level computer player. The player selects a playable card based on matching color or number, prioritizing special cards and choosing a color based on the most common color in their hand.

  • Method Details

    • chooseColor

      public Color chooseColor()
      Abstract method representing the player's strategy to choose a color when required (e.g., after playing a Wild card). Overrides the method to implement medium-level AI logic for choosing a color.
      Specified by:
      chooseColor in class Player
      Returns:
      the selected color

    • getPlayerToSwitchWith

      public int getPlayerToSwitchWith(List<Integer> handSizes)
      Abstract method representing the player's strategy to select another player to switch hands with. The implementation of this method should determine the index of the player in the list of players with whom the current player wishes to exchange hands. Overrides the method to implement medium-level AI logic for choosing another player to switch hands with.
      Specified by:
      getPlayerToSwitchWith in class Player
      Parameters:
      handSizes - a list containing the sizes of hands for each player in the game
      Returns:
      the index of the player to switch hands with
